topic.title: Installing on a system with no previous version of installed

ol.li: Download the version 6 install image TM6xBase.EXE from the ftp server.
Start the installation by running the install image TM6xBase.EXE.
On the welcome screen click on "Next".
The license agreement is displayed. Click on "Yes"
On the next screen you select a drive attached to your system, where you want to install . Select a drive and click "Next".

On the next screen, you can select the setup type:
Typical
A typical install installs the following components: (see Custom install for a list of all available components).
IBM
Language Support (All Languages)
IBM Internal Markup Tables
Sample Files
Basic Dictionaries
Documentation
Compact
A Compact install installs the following components: (see Custom install for a list of all available components).
IBM
Language Support (All Languages)
IBM Internal Markup Tables
Sample Files
Documentation
Custom
From a Custom install, you cal select the components you want to install. Note: if you select a component, which have prerequisites components, the prerequisites components will be automatically selected.
On the next screen you will see the current settings. Click "Next"
The Setup Status Window is displayed.
After copying the files, the completion window is displayed. Click on "Finish". has now been installed. Note the final message on the completion window and reboot the system if told to do so.
